subject: Re: [junit] What is the solution to test web services?
msgSnippet: ... I don t have extensive practical experience at it, but from what I see, any HTTP client oriented tests (using HTMLUnit, HTTPUnit, whatever) should be
messageBody:
Soaring Eagle wrote:

> Well... I guess I am saying that I cannot see anything that you may
> miss. Thanks.

I don't have extensive practical experience at it, but from what I see,
any HTTP client oriented tests (using HTMLUnit, HTTPUnit, whatever)
should be enough. Whether it's a great solution is another story.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
